description: The text label associated with the date field.
The placeholder text displayed inside the date field when it is empty.
Additional text that provides guidance or information about the date field.
If is cheked, the date field must be filled out before submitting the form.
Specifies the type of date input
Specifies the minimum date that can be selected based on another date field.
Specifies the maximum date that can be selected based on another date field.
If checked, allows the selection of a date range instead of a single date.
Defines how the date field behaves based on the value of another field.
Specifies the field that the select field depends on for its disabled state.
Specifies the value of the dependent field that will disable the select field.
